definition: to prepare herbal medicine by roasting or parching (in a pan)
to sauté/to fry/to dry by heating
Taku Forts, maritime defense works in Tianjin dating back to the Ming dynasty, playing a prominent role during the Opium Wars (1839-1860)
Taku Forts, maritime defense works in Tianjin dating back to the Ming dynasty, playing a prominent role during the Opium Wars (1839-1860)

sentences.english: A low-lying section of the promenade hugging Battery Park was also submerged.
sentences.chinese: 一个低洼的部分，拥抱炮台公园的长廊也被水淹没。

sentences.english: The Malage tin-polymetal deposit is distributed near the southeast lateral of the Baipaotai granite.
sentences.chinese: 马拉格矿床分布于白炮台花岗岩的南东侧。

sentences.english: Players will be able to control stationnary cannons on each tower to defend the keep.
sentences.chinese: 玩家们可以控制板楼上的炮台，协助戍守要塞。

sentences.english: They are using some sort of scrambling device to deactivate our sentry guns as well.
sentences.chinese: 他们还用一种干扰设备使我们的岗哨炮台失去了作用。

sentences.english: Greeks have built buildings, fortress, mint and theatre.
sentences.chinese: 希腊人已组建成许多建筑物，大炮台和剧院。

sentences.english: Recreating what the fort and surrounding area would have looked like back in the 17th century
sentences.chinese: 炮台和周围环境被还原成17世纪的样子。

sentences.english: The fort was divided into three layers, and an ammunition house and a barrack were set under the ground.
sentences.chinese: 炮台上下分三层，地下建有弹药库和兵舍。

sentences.english: Finally after it was shot from the fort occupied by Japanese army on the land and sank.
sentences.chinese: 最后被陆上由日军占领的炮台击中后自沉。

sentences.english: To press this point, once again the British attacked the Dagu forts.
sentences.chinese: 为达目的，英军再次炮轰大沽炮台。

sentences.english: Tomorrow we're going to have spring outing. We're going to Huli Mountain Fortress to see the king of old cannon.
sentences.chinese: 明天我们要去胡里山炮台春游，一睹古炮大王的尊容。

sentences.english: FORT】They decided to build a new fort to protect inhabitants of that area.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定建座新炮台，以保护该区的居民。

sentences.english: My cousins and I arrived at the second barbette very soon.
sentences.chinese: 我们很快就爬到了第二个炮台。

sentences.english: As the packet sails in, a sauté is fired from the battery: cheers sound along the shore.
sentences.chinese: 班轮进港时，炮台鸣炮致敬，岸上一片欢呼声。

sentences.english: But now that those threats are mostly gone, the fort is opened to tourists.
sentences.chinese: 现在这些威胁已经不存在，炮台对游客开放。

sentences.english: From pilot's Tower, looking north across the Pei-ho River to Northwest fort, Taku, China.
sentences.chinese: 大沽，在领航塔上向北看白河那边的西北炮台。

sentences.english: The epicenter was in L'Aquila, a picturesque, medi, fortress hill town.
sentences.chinese: 震中在风景如画建于中世纪的炮台山镇拉奎拉。

definition: big gun/cannon/artillery/one who talks big/trad. form 大炮 also used/CL:門|门[men2],尊[zun1]
defensive structure/military fortifications/(Tw) construction works/civil engineering works
pillbox (military fortification)/blockhouse/euphemistic way of writing 屌爆[diao3 bao4]
to prepare herbal medicine by roasting or parching (in a pan)
to sauté/to fry/to dry by heating
